body_content.explanation: something that makes things or people equal:
examples: They see education as a great equalizer.

body_content.explanation: the point in a game or competition that gives both teams or players the same score:
examples: He scored an equalizer during the closing minutes of the game.

body_content.explanation: electronic equipment that adjusts (= makes slight changes to) the frequency of recorded sound to make it sound better:
examples: Stereos typically have adjustable equalizers that boost or cut bass or treble frequencies.
